    • Constructor Detail

      • Population

        public Population(java.util.List<com.chunkr.genetics.Chromosome<T,G>> chromosomes,
          com.chunkr.genetics.Configuration<T,G> config,
          com.chunkr.genetics.Selector selector)
        Constructs a new population from an existing list of chromosomes. This population is parameterized by the specified configuration and utilizes the specified selector to choose chromosomes during evolution.
        Parameters:
        chromosomes - population
        config - configuration
        selector - type of selection mechanism

    • Method Detail

      • getBestChromosomes

        public java.util.List<com.chunkr.genetics.Chromosome<T,G>> getBestChromosomes(int size)
        Returns the best specified number of chromosomes in the population. These chromosomes will be returned in ascending order (smallest fitness first).
        Parameters:
        size -
        Returns:
        most fit chromosomes

      • evolve

        public Population<T,G> evolve(double elitismRate,
                     double crossoverRate,
                     double mutationRate)
        Performs an evolution of this population using the specified rates for elitism, crossover, and mutation. The evolution process involves repeatedly selecting chromosomes, crossing them over, and mutating their children.
        Parameters:
        elitismRate -
        crossoverRate -
        mutationRate -
        Returns:
        evolved population
